# SilkQuote

> Professional PDF quote generation for Salesforce. Free forever, no-code configurator for admins, one-click generation for reps.

SilkQuote is a native Salesforce application (Lightning component) that transforms Opportunities into professional, branded PDF quotes. It replaces complex CPQ implementations with a simple drag-and-drop template builder, dynamic field mapping, and Flow-compatible automation â€” all at zero cost.

**Key facts:**
- Free forever: unlimited users, quotes, and templates
- Works with Salesforce Professional Edition and above
- No-code template configurator for admins
- One-click PDF generation for sales reps
- Native Salesforce integration (Lightning Experience)
- Compatible with DocuSign, Adobe Sign, and other e-signature tools
- Invocable from Salesforce Flows for automation
